attributes.action: Make insurance quotes more affordable for young drivers.
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to fix this issue as soon as possible because the government have a say in what can happen, our techniques and ways don’t work, and the last resort is going to our government and asking them to do something for our young drivers.
attributes.background: We want the government to fix insurance quotes for younger drivers due to insurance charging ridiculous amounts of money for younger people, and the quotes are usually more than what the cars actually worth.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709463
